description: Backend server starts successfully and responds to health check
steps: Step 1: Start the backend server using npm start
Step 2: Make a GET request to /health or /api/health endpoint
Step 3: Verify response status is 200 and server is healthy

description: SQLite database initializes with correct schema
steps: Step 1: Start the backend server
Step 2: Check that database file is created in the correct location
Step 3: Verify all required tables exist (users, conversations, messages, artifacts, projects, etc.)
Step 4: Verify table schemas match specification with correct columns and types

description: Frontend development server starts on correct port
steps: Step 1: Run the init.sh script or start the frontend manually
Step 2: Verify frontend starts on the designated port
Step 3: Open browser and navigate to localhost with the correct port
Step 4: Verify the application loads without errors

description: Create a new conversation via API
steps: Step 1: Make POST request to /api/conversations with title and settings
Step 2: Verify response contains conversation ID and details
Step 3: Verify conversation is stored in database
Step 4: Query the conversation to confirm it was created

description: Send a basic text message and receive streaming response
steps: Step 1: Create a new conversation
Step 2: Send a simple message like 'Hello, Claude!' via POST to /api/conversations/:id/messages
Step 3: Connect to streaming endpoint and verify SSE events are received
Step 4: Verify complete response is stored in messages table
Step 5: Verify message has correct role (user) and assistant response
Step 6: Check that token counts are tracked

description: UI displays welcome screen on first load
steps: Step 1: Clear browser storage and cookies
Step 2: Navigate to the application URL
Step 3: Verify welcome screen or onboarding is displayed
Step 4: Verify suggested prompts or example conversations are shown

Step 2: Verify new conversation is created
